es.csic.iiia.bms
Interface Factor<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of the factor's identity.
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFactor, AbstractTwoSidedFactor, AllActiveIncentiveFactor, AtMostOneFactor, CardinalityFactor, CompositeIndependentFactor, ConditionedSelectorFactor, EqualityFactor, ImplicationFactor, IndependentFactor, ProxyFactor, SaturationFactor, SaturationKFactor, SelectorFactor, SingleWeightFactor, StandardFactor, TwoSidedEqualityFactor, TwoSidedReserveFactor, VariableFactor, WeightingFactor
public interface Factor<T>

Basic definition of a MaxSum factor.

Author:
Marc Pujol
